name: Haarika Srinath
body:
### Welcome to my site.
I am a second year undergraduate student at Cornell University, majoring in Biological Sciences and concentrating in Molecular and Cell Biology. I am a part of the Roeder Lab; we study cell size patterning in the sepal of the Arabidopsis Thaliana.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
